page.title: 05Queen Katherine School
page.content: {Q.K.S.}is situated in the suburbs of Kendal.It caters for about 1220 pupils. The Head, Mrs Davies, helps a lot with fund_raising activities through the Parent_Teachers' Association and by collecting sponsers from local firms. She is very strict about school uniform, thinking that it should make the pupils feel proud of belonging to the school. It also acts as a disciplinary measure. The school covers a wide variety of subjects i.e. Mathematics, English, Geography, History, French, Religious Education, Art, Computer Studies, Physical Education, Science(Chemistry, Physics, Biology), Craft(Textiles and Design, Home Economics, Metalwork, Woodwork, Plasticwork, Technology, Design) { cont.
